net.tasmod.replayer

Class Replayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tasmod.replayer.Replayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Renderer

    public class Replayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Records a Speedrun, and saves it into a File.
